scripts.start:web: npm run build-custom-build-scripts && npm run cp-sim-wasm-assets && env-cmd -e dev-web --use-shell "ng serve -c dev-web"
scripts.start:electron: npm run build-custom-build-scripts && env-cmd -e dev-electron --use-shell "electron-rebuild && npm-run-all -p ng:serve:electron electron:serve"
scripts.build:web: npm run build-custom-build-scripts && npm run cp-sim-wasm-assets && env-cmd -e prod-web --use-shell "ng build -c prod-web " && npm run wasm-js-cache-bust
scripts.build:electron:win: npm run prepackage:electron && npm run package:electron:win
scripts.build:electron:linux: npm run prepackage:electron && npm run package:electron:linux
scripts.build:electron:win64: npm run prepackage:electron && node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js win32 x64
scripts.build:electron:win32: npm run prepackage:electron && node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js win32 ia32
scripts.build:electron:win-arm64: npm run prepackage:electron && node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js win32 arm64
scripts.build:electron:linux64: npm run prepackage:electron && node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js linux x64
scripts.build:electron:linux32: npm run prepackage:electron && node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js linux ia32
scripts.prepackage:electron: npm run build-custom-build-scripts && env-cmd -e prod-electron --use-shell "ng build -c prod-electron && npm run electron:tsc && node custom-build-scripts/dist/create-dist-package.js && npm run electron-npm-i"
scripts.package:electron:win: node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js win32 x64 && node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js win32 ia32 && node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js win32 arm64
scripts.package:electron:linux: node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js linux x64 && node custom-build-scripts/dist/package-app.js linux ia32
scripts.electron:serve: wait-on http-get://localhost:8202/ && npm run electron:tsc && electron . --serve --inspect=5858
scripts.electron:debug: npm run build-custom-build-scripts && env-cmd -e dev-electron --use-shell "electron-rebuild --debug --force && ng:serve:electron"

developmentInfo: For Development you should use the local version of shared-cops to use live reload from the libary
